mapper.insert:
insert into turnout_info
turnout_info.commissioning_date,
turnout_info.direction,
turnout_info.frog_no,
turnout_info.frog_structure,
turnout_info.has_movable_point_frog,
turnout_info.has_switch_rail,
turnout_info.is_delete,
turnout_info.line_id,
turnout_info.miles,
turnout_info.operator,
turnout_info.position,
turnout_info.remark,
turnout_info.sort_num,
turnout_info.station_id,
turnout_info.status,
turnout_info.switch_rail_type,
turnout_info.thigh_track_id,
turnout_info.track_type,
turnout_info.turnout_kind,
turnout_info.turnout_length,
turnout_info.turnout_no,
turnout_info.turnout_type,
turnout_info.workarea_id, turnout_info.create_time
values
#{commissioningDate},
#{direction},
#{frogNo},
#{frogStructure},
#{hasMovablePointFrog},
#{hasSwitchRail},
#{isDelete},
#{lineId},
#{miles},
#{operator},
#{position},
#{remark},

#{stationId},

mapper.update:
update turnout_info
turnout_info.commissioning_date = #{CommissioningDate},
turnout_info.direction = #{Direction},
turnout_info.frog_no = #{FrogNo},
turnout_info.frog_structure = #{FrogStructure},
turnout_info.has_movable_point_frog = #{HasMovablePointFrog},
turnout_info.has_switch_rail = #{HasSwitchRail},
turnout_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
turnout_info.line_id = #{LineId},
turnout_info.miles = #{Miles},
turnout_info.operator = #{Operator},
turnout_info.position = #{Position},
turnout_info.remark = #{Remark},
turnout_info.sort_num = #{SortNum},
turnout_info.station_id = #{StationId},
turnout_info.status = #{Status},
turnout_info.switch_rail_type = #{SwitchRailType},
turnout_info.thigh_track_id = #{ThighTrackId},
turnout_info.track_type = #{TrackType},
turnout_info.turnout_kind = #{TurnoutKind},
turnout_info.turnout_length = #{TurnoutLength},
turnout_info.turnout_no = #{TurnoutNo},
turnout_info.turnout_type = #{TurnoutType},
turnout_info.workarea_id = #{WorkareaId}
turnout_info.update_time= current_timestamp
turnout_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select turnout_info.commissioning_date, turnout_info.create_time, turnout_info.direction, turnout_info.frog_no, turnout_info.frog_structure, turnout_info.has_movable_point_frog, turnout_info.has_switch_rail, turnout_info.id, turnout_info.is_delete, turnout_info.line_id, turnout_info.miles, turnout_info.operator, turnout_info.position, turnout_info.remark, turnout_info.sort_num, turnout_info.station_id, turnout_info.status, turnout_info.switch_rail_type, turnout_info.thigh_track_id, turnout_info.track_type, turnout_info.turnout_kind, turnout_info.turnout_length, turnout_info.turnout_no, turnout_info.turnout_type, turnout_info.update_time, turnout_info.workarea_id form turnout_info
turnout_info.id = #{id}
